description: Jackie Chan Adventures: Legend of the Dark Hand is a 2D side-scrolling brawler, where you get to play as Jackie Chan as he kicks and punches his way through ten levels of danger, utilizing a wide range of attacks.
keywords: single player,2d side scroller,beat em up,pixel art,game boy advance
name: Jackie Chan Adventures: Legend of the Dark Hand
